name: 4Dino
description:
DinoJam2 submission.

Play as a little dude that gets a dinosaur with special powers. There are multiple special powers to collect and in a bit metroidvania style world exploration.

Overall the game is relatively small. But I am happy with the result, even if it is a bit bare bones.

There is no music. I didn't get to add the theme of the jam (which is optional, but will cost me score, I know).

NOTE: The web version seems to have some focus bug. You need to click to a different window and then back to the game before keyboard input works.

Both keyboard and controller should be supported. Keybindings can be customized from the options.

Keys:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • [Space]/[Z]: Jump
  • [X]: Action (depending on dino)
  • [Shift]: Mount/unmount
  • [Tab]: Switch power
